title: Four Bedroom Duplex with Private Roof Deck!!! Sprawling Living Room!!!
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


PENTHOUSE Four Bedroom Duplex with Private Roof Deck!!! Sprawling Living Room!!! Four Spacious Bedrooms!!! PRIVATE ROOF DECK!!! WASHER DRYER in the Apartment!!! Designer Kitchen and Designer Bathroom. Central Heat and AC. Everything Brand New, Condo Quality Renovations. 5 Blocks to the Kosciuszko St. J Train. 5 Blocks to the Myrtle-Willoughby Aves. G Train. Steps to Bars, Restaurants, Cafes, Grocery Stores, Shopping and Much More!!!

AMENITIES
• Central A/C
• High Ceilings
• Exposed Brick
• Hardwood Floors
• Video Intercom
• Washer dryer installed
• Roof access
• Private roof deck
• Eat In Kitchen
• Stainless Steel Appliances
• Dishwasher
• Stone countertops
• Terrace

If you are interested in a showing please text Kirby at 929-243-4946 !!
Mention listing ID:89032!!
Must meet income and credit requirement.
